Maven and pants don't correspond 1:1, however, so this may result in some provides() being put on objects that won't ever publish, and some provides() missing on things that do.  This should serve as a first cut, that we might tweak in subsequent RBs.

[split] Performance optimizations for Future.collect Motivation: Ian O'Connell found a performance bottleneck with Future.collect where it was using indexed access of the supplied Seq, as well as repeated calls to .size ?? Modifications: Use Seq.iterator.zipWithIndex and cache the size ?? Result: 7x performance improvement: BEFORE: 0% Scenario{vm=java, trial=0, benchmark=Collect} 1455028.78 ns; ??=405245.78 ns @ 10 trials AFTER: 0% Scenario{vm=java, trial=0, benchmark=Collect} 212045.66 ns; ??=5350.07 ns @ 10 trials
